title: Senior Software Engineer
text: Support teams with a focus of funnel, orchestrating product data architecture and implementing flows for fulfillment options and add to cart. Working on full-stack TypeScript/JavaScript with React, Next.js, Node.js, React-query, Redux, Webpack, Babel, graphQL, Headless CMSs(Strapi, Contentful, Prismic, Sanity.io, ContentStack), Chart.js, D#.js, etc.

title: Senior Software Engineer
text: A part of team, responsible for the maintenance and development of the front and backend applications(2 apps in total) using React, Vue, TypeScripy, D3.js, Material-UI, Bootstrap, Redux, Vuex, Node.js, Express.js, Django, Contentful, MongoDB, and analytics tracking

title: Fullstack Software Developer
text: Built SPA using Vue.js/Vuex from the ground with vue-starter-kit

title: Frontend Web Developer
text: Worked in many different positions including grocery merchandiser, dairy merchandiser, and overnight stocking. It is a great company to work for and I learned many valuable lessons such as working with a team to achieve a common goal and tireless customer service.
